remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举由属性指定是否将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的客户端或非工作区。This enumeration is used by the property to specify whether visual styles are applied to client or nonclient areas of application windows. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个简单的程序，将应用中每四个区域指定的视觉样式值。The following code example is a simple program that applies visual styles in each of the four areas specified by the values. 若要启用视觉样式在某个区域，单击表示你想要启用，并单击的区域选项按钮 （也称为单选按钮）**更新视觉样式状态**按钮，以观察在窗口中的更改。To enable visual styles in a certain area, click the option button (also known as a radio button) that represents the area you want to enable, and click the **Update VisualStyleState** button to observe the changes in the window.
